title: design
content: Offering a range of design services including logo creation, full branding, and brand identity development for clients. Skilled in print design for various purposes such as wedding invitations, banners, posters, and flyers.

title: development
content: Frontend development using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. Proficient in Vue.js and React to create dynamic Single Page Applications (SPAs) with API integration. Also experienced in webflow development.

title: photography
content: Specializing in commercial photography, including product and food photography. Experienced in capturing memorable moments at events such as birthdays and weddings.
